titlestmt.titleproper: International Congress of Dermatology. XII Annual Congress records 1962-1962
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: International Congress of Dermatology. XII Annual Congress records

bioghist.p: Stephen T. Donohue was the director of public relations for the 12th International Congress of Dermatology held in Washington D.C. in 1962.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Stephen T. Donohue related to the 12th Annual International Congress of Dermatology session in 1962. Materials include correspondence, reports, programs, press releases, photographs of meeting events, and newspaper and magazine clippings. The collection also includes several photographs of skin diseases.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
